name: Disable-ActivityFeed
commandPattern: New-Item -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\System' -Force | Out-Null; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\System' -Name 'EnableActivityFeed' -Type DWord -Value 0; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\System' -Name 'PublishUserActivities' -Type DWord -Value 0; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\System' -Name 'UploadUserActivities' -Type DWord -Value 0
